name: BOEING VERTOL COMPANY, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Matthew J. Russo
name_abbreviation: Boeing Vertol Co. v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

parties: BOEING VERTOL COMPANY, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Matthew J. Russo.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of June, 1989, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and the Order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed with respect to the award of attorney’s fees to respondent. Daugherty v. Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board, 97 Pa.Cmwlth.Ct. 142, 510 A.2d 147 (1986).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
560 A.2d 1361
BOEING VERTOL COMPANY, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Matthew J. Russo.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 8, 1989.
